title: Vizhiyal Pesum Lyrics Enna Satham Indha Neram
stanzas:
hey vizhiyal pesum velicha poo nee
viralaal pesum anichcha poo nee
mozhiyum oliyum mounam kollum
kadavul pesum oli nee

karunai pesum eerap poo nee
katrum pesum vaasap poo nee
seviyum idhazhum dhiyaanam
kaanum kadavul
pesum mozhi nee

paravasam thondrum nodiyile
vizhiye mozhiyaai maari
vannamum koottiduthe

chinna chinnathaai
minnum aasai
siragu mulaithu varudhe

paarvai ondrile mozhiyai
meettum mozhiyin thaaragai nee
Â seiga ondrile artham koottum
mazhalai naattiyam nee nee nee

vaanavillai vilaikku vaangi nee
varnam theetti kondaadu

boomiyile vinnai kotti nee
thulli kuthiththuthan
vilaiyaadu.

...
mozhigal ketka valiyillai
mozhigal pesa idhazhgalile
mounam kooda pilai illai

kadavulin tharisanamaai
vandha mazhalaiyin
punnagai keerthanamaagum

hey vizhiyal pesum velicha poo nee
viralaal pesum anichcha poo nee
mozhiyum oliyum mounam kollum
kadavul pesum oli nee

karunai pesum eerap poo nee
katrum pesum vaasap poo nee
seviyum idhazhum dhiyaanam
kaanum kadavul
pesum mozhi nee
category: Song:Vizhiyal Pesum - Enna Satham Indha Neram

seo.title: Vizhiyal Pesum Lyrics Enna Satham Indha Neram
seo.description: Get the complete Vizhiyal Pesum Lyrics Enna Satham Indha Neram  from Enna Satham Indha Neram. Read the lyrics penned by Meenachi Sundaram and composed by Naga and sung by Chinmayi. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Meenachi Sundaram, Enna Satham Indha Neram, Naga, Chinmayi, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
